item.title: Anomaly Detection of Electricity usage
item.description: Prediction of the sales for 30490 products in Walmart Store for 28 â€” 100 days into the future Comprehensive EDA with in depth visualization and developing qualitative visualizations using matplotlib and Plotly Developed and experimented with various forecasting models in Python on 9 hierarchical time-series models and was able to achieve max RMSE of 2.5 using the LightGBM model
